name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GetVM: Instant Free Linux and IDE Sidebar
name.zh_CN: GetVM：免费的 Linux 和 IDE 侧边栏

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GetVM: Instantly access free Linux, IDEs, and apps from your browser sidebar for coding and learning.
short.zh_CN: GetVM：在浏览器侧边栏免费启动 Linux、IDE 和应用，随时上手学习编程、测试代码！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ How Does GetVM Work?
🌐 Browser Sidebar Access: Click and launch GetVM right from your sidebar.
📦 Playground Selection: Choose and start your desired OS, IDE, or app in no time.
👨💻 Learn and Practice Side-by-Side: Practice within the VM while following tutorials or videos side-by-side. Save your work with Pro for easy continuity. 

✨ Where Can You Use GetVM?
📚 Learn by Doing: Transform tutorials into interactive sessions. Use GetVM alongside guides and apply new skills instantly—hands-on, no delays.
🎥 Watch, Learn, and Practice: Launch a VM to practice as you watch YouTube. No installations, just immediate application and better retention.
🛡️ Explore New Software Safely: Test new software and updates in seconds. Explore without worries about storage space or system safety.
🚀 Develop and Debug Faster: Connect repos and debug on the go. Rely on GetVM for swift development cycles and immediate bug fixes, anywhere, anytime.

✨ Key Features of GetVM
📑 Browser Sidebar: Access everything directly from your sidebar, enhancing your "learn by doing" experience with side-by-side mode.
💸 Daily Free Quota: Practice and learn without any cost, using our daily free quota.
⏱️ Quick Startup: Launch your environment in seconds, getting you right into action.
📚 Extensive Playground Collection: Access a rich selection of playgrounds, including various Linux OS versions, IDEs, and apps.
💾 Persistence: Opt for Pro to ensure all your files and code are saved continuously, maintaining your workflow's continuity.

✨ Need Help?
💌 We're here for you! If you have any questions or need assistance, contact us anytime at support@getvm.io
long.zh_CN:
✨ GetVM 如何使用？
🌐 浏览器侧边栏访问：点击一下就可以从侧边栏直接启动 VM。
📦 环境选择：随时选择并启动你所需的操作系统、IDE或应用程序。
👨💻 边学边练：在虚拟机内练习，同时跟随教程或视频学习。订阅 Pro 可保存你的文件，方便下次继续。

✨ 你可以在哪里使用 GetVM？
📚 边做边学：将教程变成互动学习，GetVM 中跟随指南,立即动手实践新技能。
🎥 观看、学习、实践：观看 YouTube 时启动虚拟机随时练习。无需安装，即可立即应用，加深记忆。
🛡️ 安全地探索新软件：几秒钟内测试新软件和更新。不用担心占用空间或影响系统安全。
🚀 更快地开发和调试：连接代码库，随时随地调试。依赖 GetVM 实现高效开发周期，快速修复 bug。

✨ GetVM 的主要功能
📑 浏览器侧边栏：直接从侧边栏访问一切，在“边做边学”模式下提升学习体验。
💸 每日免费配额：利用我们的每日免费配额，无需付费即可练习和学习。
⏱️ 快速启动：几秒钟内启动你的环境。
📚 丰富的环境：获取各种 Linux 操作系统版本、IDE 和应用程序的丰富环境。
💾 持续性：订阅高级版确保你的文件和代码持续保存，保持工作流连续性。

✨ 需要帮助吗?
💌 我们随时为您服务！如有任何疑问或需要协助，请随时联系support@getvm.io
